name: MISSOURI, ex rel. KCP & L GREATER MISSOURI OPERATIONS COMPANY, petitioner, v. MISSOURI PUBLIC SERVICE COMMISSION, et al.
name_abbreviation: Missouri ex rel. KCP & L Greater Mo. Operations Co. v. Mo. Pub. Serv. Comm'n

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
MISSOURI, ex rel. KCP & L GREATER MISSOURI OPERATIONS COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
MISSOURI PUBLIC SERVICE COMMISSION, et al.
attorneys: Motion of Edison Electric Institute for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Missouri, Western District denied.
casebody.head_matter:
MISSOURI, ex rel. KCP & L GREATER MISSOURI OPERATIONS COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
MISSOURI PUBLIC SERVICE COMMISSION, et al.
No. 13-787.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 30, 2014.
Case below, 408 S.W.3d 153.
Motion of Edison Electric Institute for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Missouri, Western District denied.
